SELECT * FROM (
SELECT CH.ASK_NUM AS askNum, COALESCE(CH.PROGRESS_CD, GL.PROGRESS_CD) AS status, COALESCE(CH.REG_DATE, GL.REG_DATE) AS createdAt, CH.REJECT_RMK AS rejectReason,
GL.VENDOR_CD AS vendorCode, COALESCE(CH.VENDOR_NM, GL.VENDOR_NM) AS vendorName, COALESCE(CH.VENDOR_ENG_NM, GL.VENDOR_ENG_NM) AS vendorNameEng, COALESCE(CH.REG_TYPE, GL.REG_TYPE) AS businessType, COALESCE(CH.CEO_USER_NM, GL.CEO_USER_NM) AS ceoName, COALESCE(CH.ADDR, GL.ADDR) AS address, COALESCE(CH.INDUSTRY_TYPE, GL.INDUSTRY_TYPE) AS industry, COALESCE(CH.IRS_NO, GL.IRS_NO) AS businessNo, COALESCE(CH.TEL_NO, GL.TEL_NO) AS tel, COALESCE(CH.FAX_NO, GL.FAX_NO) AS fax, COALESCE(CH.EMAIL, GL.EMAIL) AS email, COALESCE(CH.ZIP_CD, GL.ZIP_CD) AS zipCode, COALESCE(CH.ADDR_DT, GL.ADDR_DT) AS addressDetail, COALESCE(CH.FOUNDATION_DATE, GL.FOUNDATION_DATE) AS foundationDate, COALESCE(CH.RMK, GL.RMK) AS remark FROM VNGL GL LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C.VENDOR_CD ORDER BY C.REG_DATE DESC, C.ASK_NUM DESC) rn FROM VNCH C WHERE C.DEL_FLAG = 'N' ) T WHERE T.rn = 1 ) CH ON CH.VENDOR_CD = GL.VENDOR_CD WHERE GL.DEL_FLAG = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT CH.ASK_NUM AS askNum, CH.PROGRESS_CD AS status, CH.REG_DATE AS createdAt, CH.REJECT_RMK AS rejectReason,
CH.VENDOR_CD AS vendorCode, CH.VENDOR_NM AS vendorName, CH.VENDOR_ENG_NM AS vendorNameEng, CH.REG_TYPE AS businessType, CH.CEO_USER_NM AS ceoName, CH.ADDR AS address, CH.INDUSTRY_TYPE AS industry, CH.IRS_NO AS businessNo, CH.TEL_NO AS tel, CH.FAX_NO AS fax, CH.EMAIL AS email, CH.ZIP_CD AS zipCode, CH.ADDR_DT AS addressDetail, CH.FOUNDATION_DATE AS foundationDate, CH.RMK AS remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C.VENDOR_CD ORDER BY C.REG_DATE DESC, C.ASK_NUM DESC) rn FROM VNCH C WHERE C.DEL_FLAG = 'N' ) T WHERE T.rn = 1 ) CH LEFT JOIN VNGL GL ON GL.VENDOR_CD = CH.VENDOR_CD AND GL.DEL_FLAG = 'N' WHERE GL.VENDOR_CD IS NULL ) VENDORS
AND VENDORS.vendorCode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{vendorCode}, '%')
AND VENDORS.vendorName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{vendorName}, '%')
AND VENDORS.industry LIKE CONCAT('%', #{industry}, '%')
AND VENDORS.businessType = #{businessType}
ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
